title: ‘That’s hard for me to understand’: Mike Vrabel’s issue with NFL officiating, message to Patriots after loss vs. Bills

bullets: New England Patriots "It's 83 days since we lost.
It was a good run, and we have to start another one.

title: Man detained in connection with Brown University shooting has been released, authorities say
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News Two students were fatally shot and nine people were wounded Saturday afternoon during a final exam at the Ivy League university in Providence, Rhode Island.

A woman knelt to set flowers and light candles outside of Barus & Holley School at Brown University where two people were killed and nine people were injured by a gunman in Providence, Rhode Island December 14, 2025.

Jessica Rinaldi/The Boston Globe The person of interest detained in connection with the deadly mass shooting at Brown University Saturday has been released, officials said at a press conference late Sunday night.

title: Owner of Milton medical spa pleads guilty to injecting unapproved botulinum toxin
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News Rodrigo de Medeiros Siqueira, of Rodrigo Beauty, was also not licensed to prescribe drugs or perform injections.
Mark H.

Milstein/ Bloomberg News The owner of the Milton medical spa that was linked to at least 14 botulism cases this summer pleaded guilty to injecting clients with unapproved botulinum toxin, federal prosecutors said.

title: Child confirmed as Connecticut’s first measles case in 4 years

title: ‘In moments like this, we see the best of Rhode Island’: Leaders react to Brown shooting
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News "The firefighters, the policemen, the civil leaders, neighbors who come together, and let us celebrate that community," Sen.
Jack Reed said.
